childNode.title: Crossover
childNode.name: Identify the option that describes the new MURANO's product portfolio
childNode.explanation: The new MURANO is one of Nissan’s middle class crossover lines. The new MURANO is meant to be driven mainly on the city streets, unlike Nissan’s PATHFINDER that is intended for off-road usage.

Node.name: the new MURANO is Authentic SUV / Middle Class
the new MURANO is Authentic SUV / Small Class
the new MURANO is Crossover SUV / Small Class
the new MURANO is Crossover SUV / Middle Class

childNode.title: Exterior Features
childNode.name:
Identify sentences that describe the new MURANO's exterior features.
1. Sculpted Edge Line 2. Dynamic Shoulder Line 3. Functional Hyper Roof-rail and X-Graphic D-Pillar
childNode.explanation: The new MURANO also has eight unique exterior points consisted of three body line features which are the sculpted edge line, dynamic shoulder line and rear line, and five object features which are the side windows, grille, front bumper, wheels and fenders.

Node.name: 1 and 2
2 and 3
3 and 1
All of the above

childNode.title: Interior Features
childNode.name:
Following three sentences describe the new MURANO's interior features. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's feature.
- Secure - Door grips that are connected to the instrument panel enhance the broad expansion of the front seats. - Warm Modern - The “Rugby ball shape” instrument panel has a non-symmetrical color break represents a curvilinear body but adds a rewarding sense of style and individuality. - Innovative -The boat shape console is appointed real aluminum to express innovation.
childNode.explanation: Secure and Roomy are also important key words to the new MURANO's interior.

Node.name: Functional-Convenient drawer called "Super Luggage" and storage space under the luggage board are equipped.
Comfortable - The ottoman style seat and sliding armrest provide a comfortable feeling for passengers.
Secure and Roomy - The round shape body gives a sense of a safe cruising to a driver.

childNode.title: Seat Features
childNode.name:
Following three sentences describe the new MURANO's seat features. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's seat feature.
- Double-stitched Leather Seat - Double-stitched leather seats portrays a luxury and inviting feeling. - Softness of the cushion - Softening the urethane pad has improved the overall seat comfort level from the previous model. - Vibration absorption - Vibration absorption and riding comfort has been improved by the increased rigidity of the seat frame.
childNode.explanation: The memory seat function enables drivers to set two seat positions that fit perfectly to them.

Node.name: Ottoman Style Seats - Ottoman style seat for the front passenger provides a long ride comfort
Memory Seats - Two memory seat position settings can be stored in the MURANO.
Seat Cooling - The air conditioner that is attached to the seats cool down a passenger's body.

childNode.title: Luggage Area
childNode.name:
Following two sentences describe the new MURANO's luggage area features. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's luggage area feature.
- Auto Flip-up Rear Seats - Cargo Divider
childNode.explanation: The lift gate is closed/opened remotely from the driver's seat or by an intelligent key. The power lift gate comes with the auto reverse function that protects passengers from pinched between the gate and the body.

Node.name: Removable floor boards and Convenient drawer
Power Lift Gate
Ladder Assist to get into the luggage area

childNode.title: 4x4-i
childNode.name:
Following two sentences describe the new MURANO's 4x4-i functions. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's 4x4-i function.
- Yaw Moment Feed Forward/Back Control. - Torque Distribution
childNode.explanation: VDC enhances the stability by controlling the braking pressure and reduces driver‘s work.

Node.name: 2WD Switch
Hill Descent Control
VDC

childNode.title: Running Stability
childNode.name:
Following sentence describes the new MURANO's running stability functions. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's running stability.
- The new shock absorber reduces the roll speed and harshness by a modified dumping force and rebound spring.
childNode.explanation: The new MURANO's running stability: - gives less vibrations during cruising. - provides drivers a smooth drive on a winding road or when they incur a bump or seam on the road.

Node.name: The new balance detector let drivers warn drivers in advance to avoid bumps on the road.
The new SDS (stable driving system) has been installed.
The new seats and body improved their rigidity, and the new suspension is utilized, both resulted in improving the vibration absorption.

childNode.title: Quietness
childNode.name:
Following three sentences describe the new MURANO's improvements on quietness. Choose another sentence that best describes the new MURANO's improvements on quietness.
- Noise reduction from the engine - Noise reduction from body holes - Noise reduction from the floor
childNode.explanation: In various scenarios, the new MURANO has attained the top-level quietness in the competing same class SUV which has enabled the driver and passengers to enjoy conversation and music in a relaxed and comfortable riding environment.

Node.name: Noise reduction from the windows
Noise reduction from the ceiling.
Noise reduction from wheels and tires.

childNode.title: CVT
childNode.name:
Is the following sentence True or False?
Adaptive Sift Control of Xtronic CVT automatically generates the shift schedule from 700 patterns based on the driver operation, road gradient and turning condition.
childNode.explanation: Vehicle speed is another important factor for Adaptive Shift Control of Xtronic CVT to generate a shift schedule.

Node.name: True
False

childNode.title: Power Steering
childNode.name:
Identify sentences that describe TOPS utilized in the new MURANO.
1. The amount of power that assists the steering wheel decreases when it is at higher speed, and provides a stable steering than the Z50. 2. The amount of power that assists the steering wheel increases when it is at lower speed, and provides a easier steering than the Z50. 3. The amount of power that assists the steering wheel decreases when it is at lower speed, and provides a stable steering than the Z50.
childNode.explanation: TOPS makes drivers to steer easily when the new MURANO is at low speed, and more stable when it is at high speed, both comparing to Z50.

Node.name: 1 and 2
2 and 3
3 and 1
All of the above
